titleStmt.title: The institutes of the lawes of England digested into the method of the civill or imperiall institutions : useful for all gentleman who are studious, and desire to understand the customes of this nation / written in Latine by John Cowel ... ; and translated into English, according to act of Parliament, for the benefit of all, by W.G., Esquire.
Institutiones juris Anglicani. English
titleStmt.author: Cowell, John, 1554-1611.
W. G.
